Room.Name: Acoma's Sarcophagus
Room.ShortDescription: You stand before the stately tomb of Acoma, a true hero of Ocenacrest.
Room.LongDescription: The body of Acoma lies in state, shielded by a magical transparent cover. The heavy sarcophagus, made of adamantine and mithrill, stands on a grassy mound and the body of Acoma can be seen through the magical shield. There is not a mark on the body, and it appears to be vibrant and alive, smiling softly with eyes closed and hands folded across the chest. Acoma clutches a golden scroll.
